title: 90: The Adventures of Robinhoe ft. Bunnie Xo
description:
TW: Child abuse, domestic violence, sexual assault, suicidal ideation

Taking over Nashville one honky tonk at a time! Sofia is joined by none other than podcast host, boss-ass-bitch, hoe AND rapper-wife, Bunnie XO! Together Sofia and Bunnie join forces for a conversation that has absolutely NO bounds. Bunnie takes us all the way back to her roots in Las Vegas, fully breaking down the hoe hierarchy and the realities of sex work that are usually left untold. Next, the two have an extremely candid conversation about traumatic childhoods, mental health, and finding the light in your darkest hours (PS: you only get 48 of them). Sloots, there’s nothing else to say but get ready for one of the rawest and real episodes yet.

Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter @SofiaFranklyn
Find merch HERE: https://sofiafranklyn.com/ 

Favor: http://www.heyfavor.com/SOFIA to get your first birth control care package and donate to help more women in need of affordable birth control
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
